name: The Long Con
description:
In the future a knight is teleported to a convention center hosting a social media con. What lies beneath the surface?

The Long Con is a short platformer where you kill demons and explore a post apocalyptic world. Get through it and  finally face off with the influencer genius behind the worlds worst convention.

This is a prototype made during  a  5 week long school project and was our first experience trying to make a digital game. 

Controls:

Attack - Space

Move and jump - Arrow keys

Restart game - R

Thanks for playing!

Asset credit: https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-fantasy-caves
